forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. Southwest wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 86. West wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. West northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
